text: wkma byanna fi hadha alquran lilmushrikin albrahyn alzzahirat fi 'amr altwhyd walnubuat walmead nbyin lahum albrahyn fi kl ma jhlwh fayaqulun eind dhlk kdhbana: telmt min 'ahl alktab, wlnbyn -btsryfna alayat- alhqq liqawm yelmwnh, fyqblwnh wytbewnh, wahum almuminun birasul allah muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam wama 'unzil elyh
